mailSubject: Updated Checklist for J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC (LEI ID: K6Q0W1PS1L1O4IQL9C32)
mailBody:
Dear Shubham,

I hope this email finds you well.

Thank you for providing the internal data for the checklist update. I have incorporated the latest information, including the PEP screening data. Please find below the updated checklist for J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC, associated with LEI ID K6Q0W1PS1L1O4IQL9C32:

### Updated Checklist Table
| Checklist Item                        | Status     | Comment                                                                                          | Source                     |
|---------------------------------------|------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------------|
| Company Address Proof                 | Validated  | Address proof is available with utility bill issued by London City Utilities.                   | DIM_CompanyAddressProof   |
| Company Annual Account and Ellipro Survey | Validated  | Annual accounts and Ellipro scores for 2020–2022 are available.                                 | DIM_CompanyAnnualAccountsAndElliproSurvey |
| Company Bank and Postal Details       | Validated  | Bank and postal details are verified with available bank account and SWIFT code.                | DIM_CompanyBankAndPostalDetails |
| Company Directorship                  | Pending    | Information available but requires verification of ID and document references.                  | DIM_CompanyDirectorship   |
| Company Tax Documentation             | Pending    | Documents available but verification is pending for most entries.                               | DIM_CompanyTaxDocuments   |
| Company Regulatory Compliance         | Pending    | Some compliance statuses are under review by respective authorities.                            | DIM_CompanyRegulatory     |
| Company Business Scope                | Pending    | Business scope information is available but verification is pending.                            | DIM_CompanyBusinessScope  |
| Company PEP Screening                 | Validated  | PEP screening data available with detailed risk ratings for high and medium-risk individuals.   | Agent Data                |
| Company Revenue Details               | Validated  | Total net revenue of 158.1 billion dollars for the year ended December 31, 2023 is reported.    | Annual Report             |
| Company Market Capitalization Details | Validated  | Market capitalization as of December 31, 2023 is reported as 489,320 million dollars.           | Annual Report             |

The updated checklist has been securely stored in JSON format in our repository. If there are any further questions or if you need additional information, please do not hesitate to reach out.

Best regards,  
Surbhi Nagori  
surbhi.nagori@capgemini.com
